Recipes.ItemDescription: Jerk Chicken is a staple dish in Jamaica that explodes with flavor. Marinated in traditional 'Jerk' spice and then grilled, this chicken is often spicy and smokey.
Recipes.ItemIngredients:
1 medium onion, coarsely chopped
3 medium scallions, coarsely chopped
2 Scotch bonnet chiles chopped
2 garlic cloves chopped
1 TB five-spice powder
1 TB allspcie berries, coarsely ground
1 TB coarsely ground pepper
1 TSP dried thyme, crumbled
1 TSP freshly grated nutmeg
1 TSP salt
1/2 cup soy sauce
 1 TB vegetable oil
Two 3 1/2 - to 4-pound chickens, quartered

Recipes.ItemDescription: Ackee and Saltfish is the national dish of Jamaica. The sweet Ackee fruit and salty codfish make for an excellent, fresh combination.
Recipes.ItemIngredients:
1/2 pound boneless salted codfish
1/2 cup vegetable oil
4 cloved garlic, finely chopped
1 sprig fresh thyme
2 onions, sliced
4 scallions, chopped
 1 cup assorted bell peppers
1/4 Scotch bonnet pepper, finely chopped with seeds removed
1 (20-ounce) can ackee, drained
1 TSP ground black pepper
 1 TSP paprika

Recipes.ItemDescription: Sweet and Sour Chicken is a staple Chinese Takeout all over the USA. The tangy sauce and crispy fried chicken are what make this dish amazing.
Recipes.ItemIngredients:
1 lb boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts
1 egg white
1/2 TSP kosher salt
2 TSP cornstarch
1 (10oz) can pineapple chunks
1/4 cup juice from canned pineapple
1/4 cup white vinegar
1/4 cup ketchup
1/2 TSP kosher salt
2-3 TBS brown sugar
1TBS + 1TSP cooking oil
1 red bell pepper
1 yellow bell pepper
1 TSP grated fresh ginger

Recipes.ItemDescription: Apple Pie is an American favorite and it is easy to see why. The warm, sweet, apples with a hint of cinnamon and the flaky crust are to die for.
Recipes.ItemIngredients:
1 box Pillsbury refrigerated pie crusts
6 cups thinly sliced, peeled apples
3/4 cups suagr
2 TBS all-purpose flour
3/4 TSP cinnamon
1/4 TSP salt
1/8 TSP nutmeg
1 TBS lemon juice

Recipes.ItemDescription: Brownies are a gooey, chocolatey delight for almost everyone. The melt in your mouth feeling really helps satisfy your sweet tooth.
Recipes.ItemIngredients:
1/2 cup melted butter or 1 stick
1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa
1 cup sugar
 2 large eggs
1 TSP vanilla
1/2 cup flour
1/4 TSP salt (leave out if using salted butter)
